[B][COLORlawngreen]NASCAR Full Race Replays Season [/COLOR][COLOR white]2020[/COLOR][/B] $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<title>[COLOR cyan]- [/COLOR][COLOR lightgreen] [makelist.param1][/COLOR] [COLOR cadetblue][makelist.param2][/COLOR]</title> <link>plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=[makelist.param2]</link> <thumbnail>https://cdn.tv-programme.com/pic/episodes/22/225953.jpg</thumbnail>
data-title="(.*?)".*?data-video-id="(.*?)"(?s).*?<div class="timestamp"><span aria-label="(.*?)" https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtc57NTUizP6oOp3FnUwQBOVWEU7XUtt9 https://cdn.tv-programme.com/pic/episodes/22/225953.jpg
test plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=$doregex[getLiveVideoID]
getLiveVideoID watch\?v=(.*?)".*?target $doregex[getMainPage]&autoplay=1
getMainPage src="(.*?)".*id=" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yAgmqYVnUZA
test 360p $doregex[getQualityLink]
getQualityLink RESOLUTION=640x360\s*(.*?)\s $doregex[nuetralizeLink]
nuetralizeLink $pyFunction:'$doregex[getlink]'.replace('\\','')
getlink hlsvp": "(.*?)" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yAgmqYVnUZA
Test $doregex[url]
url $pyFunction:'$doregex[jsonurl]'.replace('\/','/').replace('https','http')
jsonurl hlsvp":"(.*?)" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yAgmqYVnUZA
^((?:https?:)?\/\/)?((?:www|m)\.)?((?:youtube\.com|youtu.be))(\/(?:[\w\-]+\?v=|embed\/|v\/)?)([\w\-]+)(\S+)?$ ^(http(s)?:\/\/)?((w){3}.)?youtu(be|.be)?(\.com)?\/.+
